text: 24:27 Jenesis 3:15; Dɨboboniba 21:9; Godɨn Araziba 18:15; Onger Akaba 22:1-21; Aisaia 7:14; 53:7; Daniel 9:24; Malakai 3:1Egha Iesus aning geghari. A faragha Moses osirizir akabav gɨa, ghua, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akaba bar aning mɨgei. A Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn itir akar an gun mɨkemeziba, dar mɨngariba bar aningɨn sure gami.
